greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: For primes p: Number of steps to reach 2 when iterating f(p) = greatest prime divisor of p-1.
comment: For smallest prime that requires n steps to reach 2 cf. A082449.
example: 59 is the 17th prime and takes four steps to reach 2 (59 -> 29 -> 7 ->3 -> 2), so a(17) = 4.
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 01 2003
